resources.string: With Bloc, instructions are optional. Our customizable modular furniture empowers individuals to break the mold of traditional design and redefine what it means to start over.

At Bloc, we focus on giving our customers a creative alternative to modern day furniture. We offer large building blocks that can be used to make customizable modular furniture. Customers are able to buy four differently sized packages: small, medium, large, or mega. Our consumers are encouraged to exercise their creative ability by constantly modifying their designs. Whether a person is designing or redesigning their space, we provide the tools to do so. In addition, Bloc exhibits social responsibility through our partnership with Habitat for Humanity. Through this charity, Bloc is able to assist those whose lives have been ravaged by natural disasters or poverty by rebuilding their lives through helping them rebuild their homes.
This is an official Virtual Enterprises International firm application for educational purposes only for 2017-2018 - \"Bloc\"
